name: Eat The Frog First: They said
name_original: Eat The Frog First: They said
description:
Eat The Frog First : They said

Create for Game Jam : Mini Jam 106 : Frog

"Eat the frog first : They said" is a drag-and-drop arcade-style game. The player must clear out those animals before the workload is overloaded. Player can Yeet anything if necessary, maximize the outcome by prioritize time and task.



CPU : intel core i3-3220 cpu @ 3.30ghz or higher.
Ram : 2 GB or higher.
HDD : 40MB download file  and  100 MB after extract file.
VGA : Nvidia GTX 950 or higher.
OS : Window  (Linux & Mac not test yet)




Thank you for visit and loading.
